rules_text: When Crusade of the Corpses enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Skeleton artifact creature tokens.
special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I – Create two 1/1 colorless Skeleton artifact creature tokens.
II – Whenever you attack this turn, each opponent loses 1 life.
III – Put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature.
